title: Ronen Kauffman from Zombie Apocalypse
itunes:title: Ronen Kauffman from Zombie Apocalypse
description:
An old friend of the show, Ronen Kauffman, is on the show today. He's the vocalist for punk/hardcore misfits, Zombie Apocalypse, and an OG podcaster with his incredible show called Issue Oriented. We discuss creative expression, podcasting's early days and mindfulness. Enjoy! Visit Rockabilia and use the code PC100WORDS for 15% off of your order. The best place for all of your VIP experiences at shows is with Soundrink. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
